item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a postdoctoral researcher in cognitive sciences @ Ghent University interested in how our mind represents information and flexibly uses it to interact with the world. Research Interest My research focuses on studying the flexibility of perceptual and mnesic representations at behavioral and neural levels, and the cognitive control mechanisms that allow to flexibly use these information to perform various tasks. I tackle these questions using psychophysical protocols, computational modelling, and neuroimaging (EEG & fMRI).
